result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brian Guzman

records.addlTxt: Final pre-trial on December 16, 2022 at 10:00 am.

11:06 AM Defendant Brian Guzman in court.  Attorney Alexander Huber in court for State of Wisconsin.  Clerk HM.  DE needs to pay for Hope Council and attend classes. Offer made. DE requests adjmt.  Bond continued.
Final pre-trial scheduled for December 16, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Pre-trial conference on October 31, 2022 at 10:00 am.
9/21/22 hearing rescheduled due to ongoing JT.  NTBS.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.
Bond modified to $300; refund excess.   jk/mg  ck#22CH090331
Defendant is not eligible for public defender representation.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
Continued Posted
  *Not to drive w/o VALID Driver's License.

157PM   Assistant District Attorney Brenda Valdes appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  The Court finds probable cause in this case today.  Def. is referred to the Public Defender.  If not eligible, def. to retain his own counsel. Court date will not be adjourned due to def.'s failure to retain counsel.  Plea of Not Guilty entered by the court. Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 26, 2022 at 01:45 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 09:00 am. $300  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).  Refund balance.  sg
and witness list filed by the State
